resources.string:
Step 1: Check Your Inbox

We've sent an email to the address you provided during registration. Please check your inbox (and also your spam or junk folder, just in case!) for an email from us.

Step 2: Open the Verification Email

Once you've located the email, open it to view its contents. The subject line should include something like "Please Verify Your Email Address."

Step 3: Click the Verification Link

Within the email, you'll find a unique verification link. Click on the link to confirm your email address and activate your account.

Thank you for signing up! Before you can access your account, we need to verify your email address to ensure the security and validity of your account. Please follow the instructions below to complete the verification process:
Finish onboarding and fill in later!
